bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p:
TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON,
County of Spokane } SS.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Spokane County, Greeting:

IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon James White to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of A.D. 1885, at o'clock, M. to there give evi- dence in the above entitled cause on the part of said Defendant S.P. White
Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Judge of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal there- of affixed, this 30 day of April A.D. 1885

Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk.
By R. Strobach Deputy.

TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane Lincoln } SS. I hereby certify that I served the withinSubpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to J.J. White in said County, on this 30 day of April A.D. 1885

E. F. Whittier Sheriff
By J. S. Seaman Deputy.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
Returned and Filed this 30 day of, April A.D. 1885

Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk.
By. R. Strobach Deputy.

Sheriff's Fees
Serving 1 names at 40 .40
Mileage 2 miles at 10 20
Total, ---$ 60
--
100
